description.p: This release brings UFL up to date with the beta2 versions of dolfin and ffc. A few new operators have been added and several bugs have been fixed.
This release contains many bug fixes and implements some long outstanding features in preparation for the 1.0 release.
This release includes some performance improvements for evaluating basis functions. It also adds support for Bessel functions and error functions.

item.title: ufc: Maintainence update of UFC released

description.p: This maintenance update of UFC provides improved CMake support.

A new version of Unicorn has been released. This release adds support for MPI I/O and Cray's Libsci and includes various bugs and portability fixes. It is also synchronized with the chapters in the FEniCS book.
SyFi has been updated to Dolfin/UFL 1.0-beta. Build system changed to cmake.
This is the first release in a long while, and so contains numerous updates for all the projects that have evolved in this period. It is also the first release that is under the LGPL.
Please check it out and help us polish it toward the imminent release of FEniCS 1.0.

item.title: fenics-web: The new web pages have been released!

description.p: The most recent reincarnation of the FEniCS web site has now been unleashed onto the world. Please check it out and report bugs so we can squash them all before the upcoming release of FEniCS 1.0.
A new version of Viper has been released, fixing a minor bug.
A new version of UFL has been released. This version fixes a minor bug for handling constants in forms.
